definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: The victorious nations were able to dictate peace terms.
sentences.chinese: 战胜国能发号施令地规定媾和条件。

sentences.english: It is no use seeking to make peace between the two countries .
sentences.chinese: 企图使两国媾和是没有用的。

sentences.english: There are even reported cases of the deceased carrying on affairs with their loved ones from beyond the grave.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有报道说死人爬出棺材与爱人媾和。

sentences.english: He never forgave her unholy alliance.
sentences.chinese: 他永不会原谅她不洁的媾和。

sentences.english: On this same day, the first peace overtures from Rome were made.
sentences.chinese: 就在同一天，罗马第一次提出媾和倡议。

sentences.english: There are many similarities between public speaking and daily conversation.
sentences.chinese: 在公开演媾和日常扳谈之间有良多近似的工具。

sentences.english: By refusing to treat with him?

definition: to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
